component.name: Spectre password
component.summary: GTK frontend for the Spectre password algorithm.

description.p: Goodbye password managers, hello digital independence.
The Gtk frontend for the Spectre algorthm.

Spectre is a completely novel approach to digital access control. Rather than trying to keep countless passwords safe in an app, keychain or browser, Spectre holds no passwords at all. When it’s time to log in, Spectre calculates your site’s password for you on‑demand, storing it nowhere, ensuring it can never be unavailable, lost, or stolen. Is that even possible? It is now.
First release of the Spectre Rust Flatpak App. Nothing works but all the important pices are figured out (distribution, binding to the Spectre api repo)
